choroplethrAdmin1 1.1.1

  • Open Source
  • Courses
  • Corporate Services

Get all countries on the admin1 map

get_admin1_countries.Rd

Uses ?admin1.regions

get_admin1_countries()

Examples

get_admin1_countries()
#>   [1] "afghanistan"                         
#>   [2] "aland"
